lines.text: I think I'll have a snoop instead of a steak.

[after hearing Gahagan slurping his soup]
How did you find your soup?
Fine. I just looked into the dish and there it was.

[about his betting system]
Okay, I'll tell it to you, but yuh gotta keep mum.
I don't care about that, but yuh gotta keep it mum.

[Introducing Torchy]
This is Torchy Blane of the Herald, Lt. McBride's finance.
